dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: My name is Eryndor Thorne. I am the king of this land.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Nice to meet you, Your Majesty. I've heard rumors about a dark cult lurking in these woods.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Yes... the Cult of the Black Depths. They seek to summon an ancient evil and bring darkness upon our land. But we must be cautious, for they have many followers and are well-guarded.
